title: Angela Rayner – 2023 Comments on Parliamentary Watchdog Investigation into Conduct of Rishi Sunak
author: admin
summary: The comments made on Twitter by Angela Rayner, the Deputy Leader of the Labour Party, on 17 April 2023.
content:
The Ministerial Code requires all Ministers to disclose their financial interests in detail – the Prime Minister is obliged to publish the register of interests.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

It’s now been 321 days since the register was updated. What’s Rishi Sunak got to hide?
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
